**Tender Announcement**
================================

**Title**
------
Shaft Liners for the High Endurance Multi-Tasked Vessels (HEMTVs)

**Reference**
----------
PW-ML-066-29133

**Tender Status**
----------------
This tender has closed. Tender closing date: 2023-09-12 14:00:00

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

*   Solicitation Number: F7044-220205/A
*   Publication Date: 2023-07-31
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Amendment Date: 2023-09-08
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-12T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None

**Trade Agreement**
------------------

*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Category**
-------------------------

*   Procurement Category: Goods

**Delivery Information**
-------------------------

*   Delivery Date: On or before 31 March 2024
*   Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador, Quebec (except NCR), British Columbia, Nova Scotia

**Request for Proposal**
------------------------

Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement for spare propulsion shaft liners to be procured for the High Endurance Multi-Tasked Vessels (HEMTVs).

This procurement will be for two (2) sets of shaft liners as defined in this Statement of Requirement (SOR). These shaft liners will be kept as spares by CCG for use on the HEMTVs.

The Request for Proposal includes the following Mandatory Technical Criteria:

*   Bidder must demonstrate that it has in place a Quality Management System (QMS) developed in accordance with ISO 10005:2018 "Quality management systems - Guidelines for quality plans."
*   Bidder must provide its valid ISO 9001 certification if applicable.
*   Bidder must provide an example of its Quality Control Plans (QCP) as applied on previous projects for similar or greater sized shaft liners or shaft maintenance.

**Submission Instructions**
---------------------------

*   Delivery must be made to the following address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Questions and Answers**
-----------------------

Questions and answers are attached to this tender.
